vistra.framework.graph.item.state

Interface IEdgeStateHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IItemStateHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EdgeStateHandler

    public interface IEdgeStateHandler
extends IItemStateHandler
    An interface for an edge state handler.

    As being an item state handler, this handler has a cellar at its disposal. It is therefore able to hold the state history of the item and handles setting a previous state.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IItemStateHandler, IVertexStateHandler
